00008 DockBarPrivate::DockBarPrivate(Aki::DockBar* qq)
00009     : QObject(),
00010     showDockMapper(0),
00011     hideDockMapper(0),

00016 void
00017 DockBarPrivate::buttonTriggered(QAction* action)
00018 {
00019     Aki::DockButton* button = _q->buttonForAction(action);
00020     if (button && button->dock()->isVisible()) {
00021         return;
00022     }
00023 
00024     emit _q->dockShow(button->dock());
00025 }
00026 
00027 void
00028 DockBarPrivate::createAction(Aki::DockButton* button)
00029 {
00030     QAction* action = _q->addWidget(button);
00031     button->setDefaultAction(action);
00032     action->setText(button->dock()->title());
00033     action->setIcon(button->dock()->icon());
00034 }
00035 
00036 void
00037 DockBarPrivate::dockAutoHideStateChanged(bool checked)
00038 {
00039     Aki::DockWidget* dock = qobject_cast<Aki::DockWidget*>(_q->sender());
00040     if (!dock) {
00041         return;
00042     }
00043 
00044     QList<QAction*> al = _q->actions();
00045     // Loop through all the actions and fine the action for this dock.
00046     foreach (QAction* action, al) {
00047         // Now that we got the action get the widget that is assocated with the action.
00048         Aki::DockButton* button = _q->buttonForAction(action);
00049         // Check that the button is valid.
00050         if (button && button->dock() == dock) {
00051             action->setVisible(checked);
00052             button->setAutoHide(checked);
00053             // Emit the signal so the main window knows of this too.
00054             emit _q->dockAutoHideStateChanged(dock, checked);
00055             return;
00056         }
00057     }
00058 }
00059 
00060 void
00061 DockBarPrivate::dockHide(QWidget* dock)
00062 {
00063     Aki::DockWidget* widget = qobject_cast<Aki::DockWidget*>(dock);
00064     emit _q->dockHide(widget);
00065 }
00066 
00067 void
00068 DockBarPrivate::dockShow(QWidget* dock)
00069 {
00070     // Cast this to a DockWidget.
00071     Aki::DockWidget* widget = qobject_cast<Aki::DockWidget*>(dock);
00072     emit _q->dockShow(widget);
00073 }
